name: Iron City Rampage
blurb: Playing as one of the meanest villains ever, ravage Iron City for as much money as you can before the heroes return to stop you.

rewards.reward: Level 1: A special edition HD desktop wallpaper for your PC or Mac.
Level 2: You'll get the desktop wallpaper as well as several iOS optimized wallpapers for your iPhone or iPad.\r\n\r\nYour name will also be added to the games credits.
Level 3: You'll receive a free copy of the game the day it is released, as well as the above prizes.

Level 4:For a $25 pledge, you\u2019ll receive a handcrafted download link to the complete digital musical soundtrack. Warning: we are not responsible for the theme music getting stuck in your head. But we do sympathize. Plus, you\u2019ll get all of the above prizes as well.

Level 5: Game, Music, and a Shirt: A $40 dollar pledge gets you digital copies of the game and soundtrack plus a specially designed t-shirt, exclusive to Kickstarter backers. These shirts will feature the gorgeous high quality design work you'd expect from Iron City Rampage. (Please add $15 dollars for international shipping.)\r\n\r\nYou'll also be receiving all the previous perks as well.

Level 6:: A $50 pledge gets you a PDF file, suitable for printing, of \u201cThe Art of Iron City Rampage,\u201d a book of production drawings, concept art, the games comic book and high-res game art used to bring the villains of the game to life. The usual adjectives are \u201clavish,\u201d \u201cfine art quality,\u201d and \u201cgorgeous,\u201d we just weren\u2019t sure where to stick them. Plus you\u2019ll get all previous reward tiers!

Level 7: Time To Get Serious: A pledge of $65.00 will get you a high quality custom printed coffee mug from the game... The digital art book, T-Shirt, Digital soundtrack, your name in the credits, and  free copy of the game the day it is released.\r\n\r\nPhewwww, that's a mouthful.

Level 8: Forget about just receiving the digital goods. For a pledge of $95.00 We will send you the soundtrack and art book right to your mailbox. You will also receive a limited edition signed and numbered poster from the game. (Please add $15 dollars for international shipping.)

Level 9: Party People Pack: We're about to bring the party right to your door. On top of everything from the previous levels, you'll also be receiving a collection of shot glasses, coasters, mugs and a flask. All from the game, and delivered right to your door. (Please add $20 dollars for international shipping.)

Level 10: You will be immortalized: On top of the digital soundtrack, art book, wall papers and game; our world-class artist will immortalize you by turning you in to a character in Iron City.\r\n\r\nYou can choose to be a hero, villain or citizen, and our artist will make it happen!

Level 11: You're in The Game! This will be your opportunity to become a playable character in Iron City Rampage 2.0! We will work with you to create a character based on you, and then add you to the game as a playable character in our first major update.\r\n\r\nYou will also receive an autographed and framed poster of your character to show off for all eternity. (Please add $20 dollars for international shipping.)
